title: Lie To Me
resume:
Lie To Me is a South Korean romantic drama starring Yoon Eun-hye and Kang Ji-hwan.
The series revolves around a civil servant named Gong Ah-jung who pretends to be the wife of the wealthy hotel heir, Hyun Ki-joon in order to impress her former friend. It is directed by Kim Soo-ryung and Kwon Hyuk-chan, produced by Jo Sung-won and written by Kim Ye-ri.
